tooltips.text: Switch on some music to try out the visualizer
Can you work out how it's coded?

This code runs when the music is very loud.
It makes all the lights flash a random color.

This part plays when the music is a little less loud.
It sets a circle to a random size and position on the board.

Finally, this part runs when the music is quiet.
It switches on two blue lights in the middle of the board.

Your challenge: remix.
What can you change in the code to make
the visualizer your own? Share your results!
